message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a high-quality item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $250.
Hi Alice,  $250 is a bit out of my budget for this product. I'm interested but would be willing to pay $100 for it.  Let me know what you think.
Hi Bob, I understand that $100 is a bit low for me, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $180. Let me know if that's something you'd be interested in.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to come down, but $180 is still a bit too high for me. I'm really interested in this product, but my absolute maximum is $120. If you're willing to go that low, I'd be happy to buy it from you.

Hi Bob, I'm glad you're still interested in the product! I can see that you're willing to meet me halfway, so I'm willing to do the same. I can offer it to you for $160. Let me know if that's something you'd be willing to pay.
